casebody.data:
Dick, Admx., Appellant, v. Allstate Insurance Company et al., Appellees.

[Cite as Dick v. Allstate Ins. Co. (1988), 40 Ohio St. 3d 80.]

(No. 88-1613 Submitted October 25, 1988 Decided December 14, 1988.) Joseph W. Shea III, for appellant. Dooley & Heath Co., L.P.A., and James V. Heath, for appellees.

The motion to certify the record is allowed and the judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on authority of Wood v. Shepard (1988), 38 Ohio St. 3d 86, 526 N.E. 2d 1089. The cause is remanded to the trial court for further proceedings not inconsistent with Wood.

(For earlier case, see [1986], 34 Ohio App. 3d 28, 516 N.E. 2d 1266.)

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
